long_description: No step stool required! This Thule Transporter cargo box mounts to your hitch, not your rooftop, making it easy to access all your gear. Tilt-down design offers quick and easy access to the rear of your vehicle. Comes complete with 1.25 and 2 in. receiver hitch adapters for added versatility. Includes Thule's One Key System(R) and 4-pin pre-wired taillights. Also includes LPA license plate adapter so you're still street legal. Carrying capacity is a hefty 165 lbs. Requires 1.25 or 2 in. receiver hitch, Class II or higher.
short_description: No step stool required! This Thule Transporter cargo box mounts to your hitch, not your rooftop, making it easy to access all your gear.
